programme.title: The Marine
programme.desc: WWE Smackdown star and self-proclaimed "Doctor of Thuganomics" John Cena makes his explosive action feature debut as John Triton, an injured U.S. Marine who returns home from duty after violating a commander's order, only to have his wife kidnapped by a ruthless criminal. Robert Patrick co-stars as the villainous Rome -- who is more than willing to kill if it means staying one step ahead of the law -- and Nip/Tuck star Kelly Carlson appears as the endangered object of the vengeful veteran's affections. With nothing left to lose and enough training to take down a small army, the hard-fighting Triton sets out to rescue his wife, and ensure that the psychotic Rome receives a painful taste of Semper Fi justice. Commercial veteran John Bonito takes the rein for his feature directorial debut(n)

programme.title: P2
programme.desc: A corporate workaholic finds that her decision to work late on Christmas Eve has potentially deadly consequences in this thriller starring Wes Bentley and Rachel Nichols. It's that time of the year, and as the snow falls outside and families gather around the dinner table, Angela vows to close one last deal before the holiday. Now late for her family gathering, Angela rushes down to the garage in hopes of racing home and catching dinner before it gets cold. When her car refuses to start, her phone fails to get a signal, and everyone else has already left, it begins to appear as if Angela's luck may have finally run out. Thankfully, a friendly security guard appears and offers to lend a helping hand. During the course of discussion, the security guard flirtatiously invites Angela to share the Christmas dinner he has prepared in the parking office -- an offer that the high-powered corporate climber laughingly dismisses. The next thing Angela knows, she wakes up tied to a chair in the cold security office located on level P2. It appears as if the security guard's invitation wasn't optional, and that Christmas dinner was the last thing on his mind. Upon realizing just how serious her situation truly is, Angela struggles to escape her subterranean prison and make it out so that she might live to see another Christmas morning(n)

programme.title: My Blind Brother
programme.desc: A slacker named Bill lives in the shadow of his more-successful brother Robbie, a blind athlete and local celebrity. When the pair both fall for the same woman, Bill is forced to compete against his arrogant, narcissistic sibling for the first time(n)

programme.title: The Cable Guy
programme.desc: A man with relationship woes has his life taken over by a manic cable TV installer(n)

programme.title: John Tucker Must Die
programme.desc: Three teenagers two-timed by a local lothario decide to turn the tables on him in this romantic comedy. John Tucker (Jesse Metcalfe) is the big man on campus at his high school -- he's the captain and star player of the basketball team, he's got money, he's good-looking and charming, and he can have any girl he wants. However, the latter attribute is about to get him in serious trouble when three different girls at his school -- Heather (Ashanti), Beth (Sophia Bush) and Carrie (Arielle Kebbel) -- discover they've all been dating John at the same time. Determined to bring down the campus ladykiller, the girls devise a plan -- they pick a cute but socially clumsy girl who is new at school, Kate (Brittany Snow), and give her a crash course in stealing John's heart. Once Kate has John wrapped around her little finger, she's supposed to drop him like a bad habit and give him a taste of what heartbreak is really like. However, it seems that the early stages of the plan work a little too well, and John and Kate end up falling for each other for real. John Tucker Must Die also stars Jenny McCarthy, Penn Badgley, and Dan Payne(n)

programme.title: Inferno
programme.desc: Tom Hanks reprises his role as Harvard symbologist Robert Langdon in director Ron Howard and screenwriter David Koepp's adaptation of author Dan Brown's bestselling novel Inferno, which finds Langdon using Dante's The Divine Comedy as a tool in the race to prevent a devastating global pandemic(n)

programme.title: Hollow Man

Once he's invisible, Caine's newfound freedom inspires him to commit evil acts. Elisabeth Shue, Josh Brolin, Kim Dickens. Paul Verhoeven directed(n)

programme.desc: In this thrilling continuation of the epic space opera, an ex-stormtrooper, a scrappy desert dweller and a droid companion embark on a journey that brings them face-to-face with heroes from the past, who are now battling a fascist regime called the First Order(n)

programme.title: The Cable Guy
programme.desc: A man with relationship woes has his life taken over by a manic cable TV installer(n)

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: Not Exactly How We Planned. Drama about New York City nightclub owner James "Ghost" St Patrick, who doubles as a drug kingpin to an elite clientele, begins with an attack on his illegal business, one that could put a crimp in his legitimate enterprise(n)

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: Whoever He Is. Ghost and Tommy take action against those responsible for the attack on their drug organisation, while Ghost's wife deals with her new career and Ghost rekindles a former relationship with an attorney who's been after one of his people(n)

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: This Is Real. The future of the club is jeopardized as the rift between Ghost and Tasha intensifies. Later, Ghost fears that his pursuit of Angela could impact his legitimate life and place his family in danger(n)

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: Who Are You. Ghost and Tommy meet with gang leaders as Angela schedules surveillance to monitor the gathering; the mystery assailant returns; and Ghost confesses to Angela that he's married with children(n)

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: I Gotta Go. Tasha gets involved in club business after growing concerned about Ghost's attitude; and later, Ghost and Angela's affair heats up, while Tommy shows interest in a club employee(n)

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: Who You With?. While Tommy is making peace with Ruiz, Angela's attaching a wire to one of his gang members; and a distracted Ghost forgets Tasha's birthday. Later, Ghost and Angela contemplate the implications of their affair(n)

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: Loyalty. Tasha gets her first look at Angela; and Ghost discovers who might be behind the hits, while Angela tries to head off another attack. Later, Ghost commits to Angela(n)

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: Best Laid Plans. In the Season 1 finale, Ghost plans to hold a massive party at Truth in hopes of expanding out of NYC and the drug world(n)

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: Consequences. In the Season 2 premiere, Ghost gathers himself after the botched attempt on his life, and gears up to increase his participation in the drug business. Meanwhile, Tommy takes a powder upon hearing that Angela is with the feds(n)

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: No Friends on the Street. Tommy signs on to assist Ghost in expanding the drug trade, but has a serious condition that must first be met, while Ghost is surprised to learn about Kanan getting out of jail(n)

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: Like We're Any Other Couple. Ghost brings Angela to Miami, where they indulge in the fantasy of being a couple, but reality brings them back to earth. Back in New York, Tommy and Kanan bond(n)

programme.title: Power
programme.sub-title: You're the Only Person I Can Trust
programme.desc: You're the Only Person I Can Trust. Ghost battles to win back his club and must deal with those standing in the way(n)

programme.title: Power
programme.sub-title: Who You Are and Who You Want to Be
programme.desc: Who You Are and Who You Want to Be. Ghost and Tommy are under the gun in trying to deal all the product in order to pay Lobos, unaware that Holly is being grilled by the FBI(n)

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: Why Her?. After the revelation that Ghost and Jamie are the same man, Angela seeks proof; the drug syndicate picks up a new member; and Tasha protects her future by making the ultimate sacrifice(n)

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: You're Not the Man. A talk with the feds puts Tommy on edge about Holly's disappearance, while Ghost and Tasha try to rein him in. Meanwhile, Angela appears to have bought Ghost's explanation(n)

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: Three Moves Ahead. Lobos' fending off a rival drug cartel and federal authorities impacts Ghost and Tommy; and Ghost hustles to get out from under Lobos' thumb before Angela strikes(n)

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: Time's Up. Angela and the feds push Tommy to flip on Lobos or spend his life in prison, while Ghost considers doing the honourable thing, but the consequences could prove steep(n)

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: Ghost Is Dead. In the Season 2 finale, members of Ghost's organisation are turning up dead, and each body hits closer to home for him and Tommy as the threat of Kanan and Angela's investigation becomes more imminent(n)

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: Call Me James. Season 3 begins with Ghost out of the drug game, and Angela having to decide between love and honour. Also, Tasha is reeling from Shawn's death, and Tommy feels compelled to make some adventurous moves(n)

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: It's Never Over. Ghost deals with loose ends before tangling with some new nightlife competition; Tommy confronts Tasha, who must learn to coexist with Angela. Later, Tommy finds an advisor in a former lover(n)

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: I Got This on Lock. Ghost sees an opportunity to take the clubs to the next level, but the past may catch up to him; Tommy joins Tasha in a scheme, while dealing with an uncontrollable contact(n)

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: Don't Worry, Baby. A club expansion spreads Ghost thin, between Angela, the children, the business and Tommy. Meanwhile, Tommy faces a tough decision; Kanan returns to the life; and Angela has some doubts(n)

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: Help Me. Tommy goes gunning for the culprit who tried to kill him; Greg pressures Ruiz to give up the "Ghost," as Angela tries to keep them at bay. Meanwhile, Proctor brings a new problem to the fore for Ghost to deal with(n)

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: The Right Decision. Tommy and Ghost get back together to take on a ruthless foe and enlist Tasha in hopes of evading detection by Angela and her team. Later, Tommy soldiers on, but Ghost comes undone at a vital juncture(n)

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: Don't Go. Angela is left staggered after the breakup, but must rally to take on a difficult situation at work; Ghost scrambles to hold onto the club deal, while he and Tommy get reacclimated to the game. Also, Dre learns just what the La Arana card means(n)

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: Trust Me. As Mike and Angela try to ferret out the mole, she picks up a lead while trying to firm up Tommy's alibi; Tasha gets a warning; Tariq makes a dangerous new friend; and Milan orders that a new product be pushed(n)

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: I Call the Shots. Angela goes gunning for the mole, while Ghost initiates a plan to regain the club. Later, Ghost and Tasha fall into a familiar pattern; Kanan appears to have a bad influence on Tariq; and Milan addresses Tommy's thoughts of betrayal(n)

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: In My Best Interest. While in the middle of throwing the party of a lifetime, Ghost must slip away to retrieve evidence; Tasha's attempt to save her family requires she enter an unlikely alliance, while Tommy contemplates a move that will impact everyone's present and future(n)

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: When I Get Out. In the Season 4 premiere, Ghost's arrest for the murder of Agent Knox leaves him facing threats from a number of sources, while Tasha scrambles to raise bail as the Feds build a case. Meanwhile, Tommy tries to get comfortable in his new role and seeks help recovering Tariq(n)

programme.title: The River Wild
programme.desc: Fast-paced action thriller in which a young family on a white-water rafting adventure in Montana are taken hostage by a pair of dangerous fugitives. The rafting holiday - a birthday gift for the New England couple's ten-year-old son - turns into a nightmare when the two armed killers take control and try to force the mother, a proficient rafter, to use her skills to help them to escape down the treacherous rapids(n)

programme.title: The Lovely Bones
programme.desc: After bringing Middle-earth to life Peter Jackson turned his attention to Alice Sebold's best-selling novel. From difficult source material (the story starts with the rape and murder of a 14-year-old girl), Jackson's contemporary fantasy drama sees the recently deceased Susie Salmon (confidently played by Saoirse Ronan) watch the aftermath of her brutal murder from on high as her killer (Stanley Tucci turning in a master class in creepiness) prepares for his next attack. Jackson does a terrific job with much-loved and complex source material and his depiction of Susie's sometimes harrowing, sometimes beautiful afterlife lives long in the memory(n)

programme.title: Don't Breathe
programme.desc: Three teenagers plan to burglarise the home of a wealthy blind man, but their heist quickly goes awry as they end up fighting for their lives(n)

programme.title: The Crash
programme.desc: A group of white-collar criminals are recruited by the U.S. government to deal with a cyber attack targeting the stock market. However, the team discover that the hacking points to a much larger conspiracy(n)

programme.title: Money Monster
programme.desc: A TV stock-market guru, Lee Gates and his producer are held hostage during a live broadcast by a man who lost his life's savings due to a bad tip. Gates is forced to raise the stock up by 24.5 points before the bell rings, or be killed on live TV in front of millions watching(n)

programme.title: American Gods
programme.desc: Come to Jesus. As war approaches, Mr. Wednesday needs to recruit one more Old God: Ostara, aka Easter, Goddess of the Dawn, but swaying her requires making a good impression, so Mr. Nancy is brought in(n)

programme.title: Vertical Limit
programme.desc: An expedition to the summit of K2 results in disaster in this intense mountaineering adventure. When a sudden storm traps a billionaire, climber Annie Garrett and a guide in an icy crevasse, it's up to Annie's brother (Chris O'Donnell) to rescue them. But he soon discovers that one member of his rescue team may have his own agenda. Bill Paxton, Robin Tunney, Scott Glenn(n)

programme.title: American Gods
programme.desc: Come to Jesus. As war approaches, Mr. Wednesday needs to recruit one more Old God: Ostara, aka Easter, Goddess of the Dawn, but swaying her requires making a good impression, so Mr. Nancy is brought in(n)

programme.title: Kiss of the Dragon
programme.desc: This action thriller co-written by filmmaker Luc Besson stars Jet Li as Liu Jian, a Chinese intelligence officer in Paris on an assignment that finds him in the midst of an international conspiracy. When Liu's investigation gets too close to uncovering the truth, his life is seriously jeopardized and he's forced to creatively employ his martial arts skills, which includes using a pool ball and the French flag as defensive props. In the meantime, romantic sparks fly between Liu and a sexy witness (Bridget Fonda), while the agent discovers that a trusted French peer (longtime Besson featured player Tcheky Karyo) is actually the double-crossing criminal mastermind he's seeking(n)

programme.title: Meet Joe Black
programme.desc: Martin Brest produced and directed this Death Takes a Holiday remake, scripted by Ron Osborn, Jeff Reno, Kevin Wade, and Bo Goldman. On vacation to Earth, Death (Brad Pitt) experiences human emotions as he learns about life from a businessman (Anthony Hopkins) -- while the businessman's daughter (Claire Forlani) teaches him about love. Filmed in Warwick, Rhode Island, and New York(n)

programme.title: Money Monster
programme.desc: A TV stock-market guru, Lee Gates and his producer are held hostage during a live broadcast by a man who lost his life's savings due to a bad tip. Gates is forced to raise the stock up by 24.5 points before the bell rings, or be killed on live TV in front of millions watching(n)

Jackson does a terrific job with much-loved and complex source material and his depiction of Susie's sometimes harrowing, sometimes beautiful afterlife lives long in the memory(n)

programme.title: Friday After Next
programme.desc: Ice Cube co-wrote and stars in this second sequel to the 1995 comedy "Friday," which once again follows a day in the life of two cousins in Los Angeles. This time, Craig (Ice Cube) and Day-Day (Mike Epps) are robbed by Santa Claus on Christmas Eve, and the not-so-jolly old elf has made off with their rent money. John Witherspoon, Bebe Drake(n)

programme.title: Concussion
programme.desc: This sports-drama centers on the research conducted by forensic neuropathologist that raised public awareness about Chronic Traumatic Encephalopathy resulting from such high-impact sports as professional football(n)

programme.title: War Room
programme.desc: A seemingly perfect couple are actually dealing with a failing marriage, and seek advice from an elderly woman who urges them to find fulfillment through prayer(n)

programme.title: Miracles From Heaven
programme.desc: Religious drama based on a true story about a young girl who is miraculously cured of a digestive disorder following a serious accident(n)

programme.title: Made of Honor
programme.desc: A man's in love with a woman, only the woman is engaged to someone else and asks the male friend to be her Maid of Honor. He agrees, with the intent of winning her heart for himself. Starring Patrick Dempsey, Michelle Monaghan(n)

programme.title: Concussion
programme.desc: This sports-drama centers on the research conducted by forensic neuropathologist that raised public awareness about Chronic Traumatic Encephalopathy resulting from such high-impact sports as professional football(n)

programme.desc: Come to Jesus. As war approaches, Mr. Wednesday needs to recruit one more Old God: Ostara, aka Easter, Goddess of the Dawn, but swaying her requires making a good impression, so Mr. Nancy is brought in(n)

programme.title: Obsessed
programme.desc: Enticement leads to terror when Lisa, a sexy office temp, forms a dangerous fixation on a successful and happily married asset manager named Derek. As her obsession progresses to stalking, Derek's idyllic marriage and promising career slowly disintegrate, until the once-happy couple and their newborn are forced into hiding as Lisa's wrath threatens to destroy them entirely(n)

programme.title: Miracles From Heaven
programme.desc: Religious drama based on a true story about a young girl who is miraculously cured of a digestive disorder following a serious accident(n)

programme.title: Made of Honor
programme.desc: A man's in love with a woman, only the woman is engaged to someone else and asks the male friend to be her Maid of Honor. He agrees, with the intent of winning her heart for himself. Starring Patrick Dempsey, Michelle Monaghan(n)

programme.title: Private Parts
programme.desc: When Cheryl and her roommate quarrel, Cheryl moves into her aunt's hotel in downtown L.A. rather than return home to Ohio. She wants to be treated like a woman, and she's drawn to George, a handsome photographer who lives in the hotel(n)

programme.title: Concussion
programme.desc: This sports-drama centers on the research conducted by forensic neuropathologist that raised public awareness about Chronic Traumatic Encephalopathy resulting from such high-impact sports as professional football(n)

programme.title: Obsessed
programme.desc: Enticement leads to terror when Lisa, a sexy office temp, forms a dangerous fixation on a successful and happily married asset manager named Derek. As her obsession progresses to stalking, Derek's idyllic marriage and promising career slowly disintegrate, until the once-happy couple and their newborn are forced into hiding as Lisa's wrath threatens to destroy them entirely(n)

programme.title: Beautiful Boy
programme.desc: In this powerful, affecting drama, married couple Bill (Michael Sheen) and Kate (Maria Bello) are on the verge of separating when they learn their teenage son went on a murderous rampage at his college that ended in his suicide. As they both look for answers, they are forced to face bitter truths about themselves(n)

programme.title: Big Star: Nothing Can Hurt Me
programme.desc: A profile of the seminal power-pop band Big Star, who released three albums that influenced many groups in the decades after they came out to mostly indifferent sales(n)

programme.title: Future Weather
programme.desc: A budding young environmental biologist (Perla Haney-Jardine) reluctantly takes her first steps toward an uncertain future after her mother runs away, leaving her in the care of an acerbic grandmother who believes she knows what's best for the bright teenager in this coming-of-age drama featuring Lili Taylor, Amy Madigan, and William Sadler(n)

programme.title: No
programme.desc: A shrewd young ad executive is recruited for a political campaign to vote Chilean president Augusto Pinochet out of office. But the real challenge is convincing the cynical Chileans that the election isn't a sham(n)

programme.title: Lost in Translation
programme.desc: Bill Murray stars in Sofia Coppola's Oscar-winning romantic comedy-drama as over-the-hill actor Bob Harris, who is lured to Tokyo to 'act' in a whisky commercial in return for big money. In the hotel bar he bumps into Charlotte who has been left to her own devices while her husband, a successful photographer, is on an assignment. Two strangers in an unfamiliar city, they form a friendship that slips into tenderness as they recognise each other's vulnerability. By turn comic and touching, the duo turn in pitch-perfect performances(n)

programme.title: How to Kill Your Neighbor's Dog
programme.desc: For Hollywood playwright Peter, life is on the down side. But when a new neighbor moves in with an 8-year old daughter he starts to see life in another way. His wife is more than happy as she's been wanting a child for some time and thinks that this could make Peter change his attitude towards it(n)

programme.title: Laurel Canyon
programme.desc: Writer/director Lisa Cholodenko follows up her much-acclaimed 1997 debut High Art with this examination of a young couple seduced into a hedonistic, left-coast lifestyle. Taking its title from its central locale, Laurel Canyon focuses on a pair of upper-middle class lovebirds from the East Coast who relocate to Los Angeles. Freshly minted from Harvard, Sam (Christian Bale) and Alex (Kate Beckinsale) are eager to continue their medical studies out West, but they need some lodging while they hunt for a home. Enter Jane (Frances McDormand), Sam's estranged, Age-of-Aquarius mom, who's more than willing to put the couple up in her lavish digs. Jane is a successful record producer whose latest charge -- both in the studio and in her bedroom -- is Ian (Alessandro Nivola), a brazen, libidinous twentysomething Brit-rocker. As Sam and Alex settle in at Jane's, they gradually lose their straight-and-narrow approach to life and begin to experiment. Alex takes to Ian and Jane, while Sam is wooed by co-worker Sara (Natascha McElhone). Laurel Canyon features a score by Shudder to Think's Craig Wedren; the music for Ian's band was provided by Sparklehorse's Mark Linkous and indie-rockers Folk Implosion(n)

programme.title: Ten Thousand Saints
programme.desc: A punk-loving teen moves to New York City in the late '80s with his bohemian dad, and gets caught up in the local music scene in this exhilarating coming-of-age story. He also befriends a girl his age who's coping with an unplanned pregnancy(n)

programme.title: The Man Who Wasn't There
programme.desc: Billy Bob Thornton stars in Joel and Ethan Coen's stylish blend of comedy, crime drama and film noir. Thornton plays a small-town barber in 1949 California. When he gets an investment tip from a client, the man decides to blackmail his wife's lover to raise the cash. James Gandolfini, Frances McDormand, Michael Badalucco, Jon Polito(n)

programme.title: Broken Flowers
programme.desc: After breaking up with his girlfriend, a middle-aged man receives a letter informing him of a 19-year-old son he never knew existed. After narrowing the possibilities of who could be the mother, Don sets out to visit former lovers and meet the son who wants to find his father(n)

programme.title: Lost in Translation
programme.desc: Bill Murray stars in Sofia Coppola's Oscar-winning romantic comedy-drama as over-the-hill actor Bob Harris, who is lured to Tokyo to 'act' in a whisky commercial in return for big money. In the hotel bar he bumps into Charlotte who has been left to her own devices while her husband, a successful photographer, is on an assignment. Two strangers in an unfamiliar city, they form a friendship that slips into tenderness as they recognise each other's vulnerability. By turn comic and touching, the duo turn in pitch-perfect performances(n)

programme.title: Smart People
programme.desc: Commercial director Noam Murro makes the leap to feature films with this comedy drama concerning an aging professor-turned-bitter eccentric due to the death of his longtime wife. Ever since his wife passed away, Lawrence Wetherhold (Dennis Quaid) has become overly acerbic and self-absorbed. He's alienated his son (Ashton Holmes) and transformed his daughter (Ellen Page) into a friendless overachiever. Now, at the precise moment Lawrence thought he had finally figured it all out, his life comes crashing down all around him as he falls for a former student (Sarah Jessica Parker) and his shiftless adopted brother (Thomas Haden Church) comes knocking on the door in search of a place to stay. Though Lawrence always relied on his intelligence to get him out of life's little jams in the past, it's going to take quite a bit more than intellectual thinking to move past this sticky stage in his suddenly chaotic life. David Denman and Christine Lahti co-star in this romantic comedy drama, which serves as the screenwriting debut of Goats and Modern Ranch Living author Mark Jude Poirier(n)

programme.title: Friends With Money
programme.desc: LA thirtysomething Olivia watches all her friends getting married and building their careers. Meanwhile, she still works as a maid and doesn't have a boyfriend. Romantic comedy with a great female cast(n)

programme.title: We Own the Night
programme.desc: A shady Brooklyn nightclub owner clashes with his police-chief father and cop brother in 1988 in this riveting crime thriller starring Joaquin Phoenix, Mark Wahlberg and Robert Duvall. Written and directed by James Gray(n)

programme.title: Of Mice and Men
programme.desc: Gary Sinise both directs and stars as George, one of a pair of Depression drifters, the other being the innocent, childlike Lennie (John Malkovich). They end up working on a farm owned by Curley (Casey Siemaszko) where Lennie is tormented by Curley's wife (Sherilyn Fenn) who flaunts herself to the hired hands(n)

programme.title: The Hollars
programme.desc: In this charming comedy-drama, a frustrated cartoonist awaiting the birth of his first child is forced to reconnect with his dysfunctional family when his mother is diagnosed with a brain tumor(n)

programme.title: The Raven
programme.desc: Upon discovering that a psychotic serial killer has been using his writings as inspiration, legendary author Edgar Allan Poe (John Cusack) joins forces with a bright, young Baltimore detective to catch the maniac and end his reign of terror. Detective Emmett Fields (Luke Evans) was investigating a vicious murder when he realized the crime scene bore a striking resemblance to a mystery story that was just published in the local newspaper. The author of that ominous tale was Edgar Allan Poe, a brilliant young writer whose status as a social outcast catches the attention of the diligent detective. Shortly after Poe is questioned by the authorities, detectives stumble upon yet another murder scene that seems to have been inspired by the author's morbid writings. Convinced that the killer will once again use Poe's writings as a springboard to murder, Detective Fields recruits the reclusive author to help piece together a pattern to the crimes and stop the madman before he can strike again. Brendan Gleeson and Alice Eve co-star in this tense period thriller from director James McTeigue (V for Vendetta)(n)

programme.title: Being John Malkovich
programme.desc: Spike Jonze's Oscar-nominated, BAFTA-winning film is based on a simple premise. On the 71/2th floor of an office block, John Cusack discovers a door that's a portal into John Malkovich's head for 15 minutes (before you're spat out on the New Jersey Turnpike). He and fellow worker Catherine Keener start selling tickets, much to the bemusement of Malkovich, who finds himself regularly invaded. Matters become complicated when Cusack's wife (Cameron Diaz) gets involved and what was a partnership becomes a ménage-a-trois (or quatre, including Malkovich). Totally unique, totally bizarre, totally wonderful(n)

programme.title: Friends With Money
programme.desc: LA thirtysomething Olivia watches all her friends getting married and building their careers. Meanwhile, she still works as a maid and doesn't have a boyfriend. Romantic comedy with a great female cast(n)

programme.title: Truth
programme.desc: Docudrama about the controversial 2004 "60 Minutes" exposé on then-president George W. Bush's military service, and the fallout that producer Mary Mapes and anchor Dan Rather suffered after questions were raised about the validity of key documents in the report(n)

programme.title: The Invisible Woman
programme.desc: An actress wrestles with feelings of guilt and remorse following an affair with Charles Dickens(n)

programme.title: Basquiat
programme.desc: An unusual film examining the turbulent life of noted postmodern artist Jean-Michel Basquiat, from his first graffiti works as 'Samo,' his collaborations with Andy Warhol in the 1980s, and his tragic death from a heroin overdose. Jeffrey Wright, David Bowie, Dennis Hopper, Gary Oldman, Michael Wincott, Claire Forlani, Benicio Del Toro, Courtney Love, Julian Schnabel(n)

programme.title: Tumbledown
programme.desc: The grieving widow of a singer-songwriter clashes with an acerbic journalist who arrives in her small Maine town announcing he's writing a biography about her late husband and his mysterious death. What begins as a clash of wills evolves into something more profound, as the journalist's presence helps her make peace with her husband's passing(n)

programme.title: The Hollars
programme.desc: In this charming comedy-drama, a frustrated cartoonist awaiting the birth of his first child is forced to reconnect with his dysfunctional family when his mother is diagnosed with a brain tumor(n)

On the 71/2th floor of an office block, John Cusack discovers a door that's a portal into John Malkovich's head for 15 minutes (before you're spat out on the New Jersey Turnpike). He and fellow worker Catherine Keener start selling tickets, much to the bemusement of Malkovich, who finds himself regularly invaded. Matters become complicated when Cusack's wife (Cameron Diaz) gets involved and what was a partnership becomes a ménage-a-trois (or quatre, including Malkovich). Totally unique, totally bizarre, totally wonderful(n)

programme.title: Wet Hot American Summer
programme.desc: It's 1981 and the last day at a Maine summer camp, where both the counselors and the campers are looking for a good time.This hilarious spoof of the summer-camp films of the '70s and '80s features Janeane Garofalo as the chief counselor and David Hyde Pierce as the object of her affection. Written by Michael Showalter and David Wain of the sketch comedy The State. Paul Rudd, Molly Shannon, Amy Poehler, Christopher Meloni(n)

programme.title: Basquiat
programme.desc: An unusual film examining the turbulent life of noted postmodern artist Jean-Michel Basquiat, from his first graffiti works as 'Samo,' his collaborations with Andy Warhol in the 1980s, and his tragic death from a heroin overdose. Jeffrey Wright, David Bowie, Dennis Hopper, Gary Oldman, Michael Wincott, Claire Forlani, Benicio Del Toro, Courtney Love, Julian Schnabel(n)

programme.title: Superstar
programme.desc: Molly Shannon brings her Saturday Night Live character Mary Katherine Gallagher to the silver screen. A mildly hyperactive Catholic school student convinced that she smells bad, Mary Catherine has a dream: she wants a boy to kiss her. Not just any old sloppy teenage make-out party kind of smooch, but the sort of kiss that will make her tingle with joy from head to toe. The trouble is, boys aren't all that interested in Mary Catherine, especially not Sky (Will Ferrell), the boy she'd most like to be kissed by. So Mary Catherine has a goal: if she wants to be kissed the way boys kiss girls in the movies, then she must become a movie star. Not a bad idea, but how does one bring this about? Superstar co-stars Elaine Hendrix and former Kids in the Hall cast member Mark McKinney, while another Kids in the Hall alumnus, Bruce McCulloch, directed(n)

programme.title: One Fine Day
programme.desc: Hollywood heart-throbs Michelle Pfeiffer and George Clooney fall for one another in this old-fashioned romantic New York comedy about a pair of mismatched professionals. Melanie Parker (Pfeiffer) is a single parent and professional architect who somehow manages to combine the skills of her high-flying career with those of a supermum to her young son. Jack Taylor (Clooney), meanwhile, is a newspaper columnist who takes custody of his daughter every other weekend. On this particular fine day, Melanie, Jack and their children are going to be thrown together by circumstance for one chaotic day in which they will lose each other, miss meetings, jeopardise their careers - and find true love!(n)

programme.title: Baby Boom
programme.desc: When a professional woman with a high-profile job "inherits" a 14-month-old baby girl from recently deceased relatives, she intends to put her up for adoption, but she discovers that she likes the kid and motherhood. So life begins to go through some massive changes(n)

programme.title: The Game Plan
programme.desc: Narcissistic football player Joe 'The King' Kingman thinks he has it all, then he finds out his ex-wife never told him about their daughter. But is he ready for the responsibility? Comedy(n)

programme.title: Cheaper by the Dozen 2
programme.desc: A family holiday gets competitive when dad of 12 Tom Baker discovers that his childhood rival has hit the big time and erected a huge holiday home on the same lake(n)

programme.title: The Flintstones
programme.desc: Live-action version of the classic cartoon. Fred Flintstone donates his family savings to help neighbours Barney and Betty Rubble adopt a child, much to the dismay of Fred's mother-in-law Pearl. To return the favour, Barney swaps slabs with Fred in an aptitude test, resulting in Fred being promoted while Barney is left in the dole queue(n)

programme.title: Sweet Home Alabama
programme.desc: George and Madeleine meet at an art acution and it is love at first sight. After six months of marriage, they travel to North Carolina to meet George's family who are fundamental Christians. This meeting of opposites exposes the fragile family dynamics as hidden resentments and anxieties surface(n)

programme.title: What's the Worst That Could Happen?
programme.desc: Kevin Caffery is a professional thief with taste and style who gets a tip for an easy heist: Billionaire tycoon Max Fairbanks' unoccupied beachfront mansion. But as Kevin is tossing Faberge eggs into his professional pillowcase, he finds himself face to face with the billionaire. Just before the cops drag Kevin away, Max spies Kevin's good-luck ring and decides to claim it as his own Only one problem...the ring was given to Kevin by his new love, and he is determined to get it back. How far will these two men go? As far as they have to. Even if it means divorce, public scandal, financial ruin, and prison. This battle of capitalist vs. robber escalates into a colossal tournament of egos threatening to take both men and everyone around them down(n)

programme.title: The Hot Chick
programme.desc: Mean cheerleader Jessica learns a humiliating lesson when she swaps bodies with small-time crook Clive. While she struggles with body hair and high school, Clive's having a ball as a 16-year-old cutie(n)

programme.title: The Game Plan
programme.desc: Narcissistic football player Joe 'The King' Kingman thinks he has it all, then he finds out his ex-wife never told him about their daughter. But is he ready for the responsibility? Comedy(n)

programme.title: Sweet Home Alabama
programme.desc: George and Madeleine meet at an art acution and it is love at first sight. After six months of marriage, they travel to North Carolina to meet George's family who are fundamental Christians. This meeting of opposites exposes the fragile family dynamics as hidden resentments and anxieties surface(n)

programme.title: Superstar
programme.desc: Molly Shannon brings her Saturday Night Live character Mary Katherine Gallagher to the silver screen. A mildly hyperactive Catholic school student convinced that she smells bad, Mary Catherine has a dream: she wants a boy to kiss her. Not just any old sloppy teenage make-out party kind of smooch, but the sort of kiss that will make her tingle with joy from head to toe. The trouble is, boys aren't all that interested in Mary Catherine, especially not Sky (Will Ferrell), the boy she'd most like to be kissed by. So Mary Catherine has a goal: if she wants to be kissed the way boys kiss girls in the movies, then she must become a movie star. Not a bad idea, but how does one bring this about? Superstar co-stars Elaine Hendrix and former Kids in the Hall cast member Mark McKinney, while another Kids in the Hall alumnus, Bruce McCulloch, directed(n)

programme.title: The Hot Chick
programme.desc: Mean cheerleader Jessica learns a humiliating lesson when she swaps bodies with small-time crook Clive. While she struggles with body hair and high school, Clive's having a ball as a 16-year-old cutie(n)

programme.title: Mallrats
programme.desc: Kevin Smith's follow-up to his unexpected hit Clerks details the pointless story of T.S. (Jeremy London) and Brodie (Jason Lee), two suburban New Jersey slackers who decide to head to the mall in search of solace after being dumped by their girlfriends (Shannon Doherty and Claire Forlani, respectively). There the two young men machinate to appear on a game show being staged and also manage to meet comic-book magnate Stan Lee. However, complications arise when the girls show up(n)

programme.title: In & Out
programme.desc: Kevin Kline's comic turn highlights this winning farce about a straitlaced teacher whose world is shattered when a former student refers to him as gay on TV. The teacher is forced to re-examine his sexuality while fending off his worried bride-to-be (Joan Cusack) and a gay reporter (Tom Selleck). Matt Dillon, Debbie Reynolds, Wilford Brimley Bob Newhart(n)

programme.title: Sydney White
programme.desc: Modern American retelling of the fairytale Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs. Sydney White goes away to college and enrols in the same sorority house her mother used to be in, only to find that girls these days aren't as nice as her mother. Moving in with seven social outcasts in the run-down frat house next door, she takes on the system and tries to show the cool kids how selfish their hierarchy has become(n)

programme.title: Summer Rental
programme.desc: After air traffic controller Jack Chester loses a plane, he's told to take a break. Booking his family into a plush resort, however, his much-needed vacation soon turns into a total disaster(n)

programme.title: Alpha and Omega
programme.desc: Two young wolves from opposite ends of the social order work together to return home after both are relocated by park rangers. During their journey a mutual affection develops. Dennis Hopper lends his voice in his last film appearance(n)

programme.title: The Flintstones
programme.desc: Live-action version of the classic cartoon. Fred Flintstone donates his family savings to help neighbours Barney and Betty Rubble adopt a child, much to the dismay of Fred's mother-in-law Pearl. To return the favour, Barney swaps slabs with Fred in an aptitude test, resulting in Fred being promoted while Barney is left in the dole queue(n)

programme.title: The Flintstones in Viva Rock Vegas
programme.desc: Before the Flintstones were everyone's favorite Stone Age family, Fred was just a regular guy looking for the girl of his dreams, and his romance with Wilma sets the stage for this prequel to the 1994 screen adaptation of the popular cartoon series. Fred Flintstone (Mark Addy), a working-class caveman who earns his living at Mr. Slate's quarry, falls in love with wealthy heiress Wilma Slaghoople (Kristen Johnson). While many people think that Fred is out of his league, including Wilma's mother Pearl (Joan Collins) and her father Col. Slaghoople (Harvey Korman), he's determined to win her heart. And when his best friend Barney Rubble (Stephen Baldwin) decides to take his best girl Betty (Jane Krakowski) for a fun weekend in Rock Vegas, he invites Wilma to tag along. The Flintstones in Viva Rock Vegas recasts all the major roles from 1994's The Flintstones; Harvey Korman is the only actor to appear in both films, though in different roles (in the previous movie, he was the voice of the Dictabird)(n)

programme.title: That Thing You Do!
programme.desc: Lovingly accurate pastiche of Beatles mayhem written and directed by Tom Hanks. A talented drummer joins an amateur band with his friends and the group pens a smash-hit record only to find the rewards of fame are cursed with pressures in this funny and charming tale with an excellent title track(n)

programme.title: Crocodile Dundee II
programme.desc: Paul Hogan returns as Mick 'Crocodile' Dundee in John Cornell's sequel to the hit comedy original. When his girlfriend Sue Charlton comes into possession of incriminating photographs pointing at drugs baron Rico, he kidnaps her but not before Mick obtains the evidence. Now Mick must use all of his bush craft, both in America and in his native Outback, to free her and collar the baddies(n)

programme.title: The Family Stone
programme.desc: Uptight career girl Meredith makes a bad impression on the Stone family when she's introduced as their next in-law. It's not that she's mean, she just can't do anything right. Can Meredith's sister Julie help smooth things over? Diamond comedy with a strong female cast(n)

programme.title: Running Scared
programme.desc: Two Chicago cops travel to Florida in an attempt to bring down a lethal drug-dealer trying to make himself into a major kingpin(n)

programme.title: Groundhog Day
programme.desc: Hilarious and inventive comedy about cynical weatherman Murray who is forced to live Groundhog Day over and over in a small town. With no consequences for his actions, Murray experiments with situations, people and even death as he tries to win over the affection of Andie MacDowell(n)

programme.title: Clerks II
programme.desc: Kevin Smith's hilarious sequel to his raunchy 1994 breakthrough movie revisits the world of New Jersey slackers Dante (Brian O'Halloran) and Randal (Jeff Anderson), who are now working at a fast-food restaurant. Rosario Dawson, Jason Mewes, Trevor Fehrman(n)

programme.title: Get a Job
programme.desc: In this timely comedy about millennial malaise, a couple who recently graduated from college try to hack it in the real world. He learns that his writing internship will no longer lead to a job, while she is laid off from her first post-grad position(n)

programme.title: Crocodile Dundee II
programme.desc: Paul Hogan returns as Mick 'Crocodile' Dundee in John Cornell's sequel to the hit comedy original. When his girlfriend Sue Charlton comes into possession of incriminating photographs pointing at drugs baron Rico, he kidnaps her but not before Mick obtains the evidence. Now Mick must use all of his bush craft, both in America and in his native Outback, to free her and collar the baddies(n)

programme.title: The Skulls
programme.desc: In this suspense drama, a college student finds himself immersed in forces beyond his control. Born and raised in a working-class Connecticut community, Luke McNamara (Joshua Jackson) made it into an Ivy League college, where he's done quite well; his dream is to be accepted into Harvard Law School, but he knows that it will take more than a good report card to beat out the competition. When an upper-crust secret society called the Skulls asks Luke to join, he eagerly accepts, thinking that the club's connections will help him gain acceptance to Harvard. He enjoys the Skulls' luxurious lifestyle, but when his roommate, a journalism student, dies of an apparent suicide, he's convinced that something is wrong. The deeper Luke digs into the secrets of the Skulls, the more he's convinced that his friend's death was no suicide and that he's put himself in more danger than he imagined. The Skulls was the first starring vehicle for Joshua Jackson, who gained fame on the TV series Dawson's Creek; the supporting cast includes Paul Walker, Craig T. Nelson, Hill Harper, and William L. Petersen(n)

programme.title: The Minus Man
programme.desc: Owen Wilson stars in this unnerving chiller as a personable drifter with a dark secret. He plays an amiable guy who blows into a small town, where he's taken in by a couple (Brian Cox, Mercedes Ruehl) who don't know that the he's a cold-blooded killer. Rocker Sheryl Crow has a small role. Janeane Garofalo, Dwight Yoakam, Eric Mabius(n)

programme.title: Honey 2
programme.desc: Recently released from juvenile detention after a brush with the law, talented dancer Maria Ramirez has returned to her gritty Bronx roots to rebuild her life. When a rare night out at a local dance club gives her an opportunity to let loose, Maria's killer moves catch the eye of Brandon, a Rec Center volunteer who invites her to help him transform a group of gifted but undisciplined dancers into a competitive crew. This might be her big chance at creating a new and meaningful life(n)

programme.title: Ghostbusters
programme.desc: Two paranormal researchers join forces with a nuclear engineer and a subway attendant to fight off a slew of ghosts that have invaded New York City. Eventually, they come face-to-face with an evil entity who can control human beings(n)

programme.title: The Detonator
programme.desc: Sonni Griffith is en route to Poland to expose a notorious arms dealer when the dealer is tipped off to the agent's identity and Griffith subsequently ends up in a prison cell. Soon released by the CIA with a mission to escort beautiful Russian Nadia back to the United States, Griffith quickly learns that the very same arms dealer he sought to wipe out is willing to kill for a valuable secret known only to his strong-willed charge(n)

programme.title: How Stella Got Her Groove Back
programme.desc: Drama about a 40-year-old single mother who begins a relationship with a man half her age while on holiday in Jamaica, much to the disapproval of both their families. Adapted from the best-selling novel by Terry McMillan, who loosely based the story on her own experience(n)

programme.title: The Wiz
programme.desc: Lavish sets, New York City locations and urban rhythms highlight this version of "The Wizard of Oz," based on the Broadway hit(n)

programme.title: Ghostbusters
programme.desc: Two paranormal researchers join forces with a nuclear engineer and a subway attendant to fight off a slew of ghosts that have invaded New York City. Eventually, they come face-to-face with an evil entity who can control human beings(n)

programme.title: Honey
programme.desc: Jessica Alba stars as Honey Daniels, a dancer and choreographer who struggles to get by until she gets her one big break, but soon she realises that it's too good to be true. [2003](n)

programme.title: Senseless
programme.desc: A college student overwhelmed with debt agrees to be a guinea pig for the science department, unaware that the chemical he ingests heightens his five senses to unheard-of proportions. Marlon Wayans, David Spade, Matthew Lillard, Brad Dourif, Tamara Taylor, Rip Torn, Richard McGonagle, Esther Scott, Ken Lerner, Kenya Moore, Ernie Lively(n)

programme.title: How Stella Got Her Groove Back
programme.desc: Drama about a 40-year-old single mother who begins a relationship with a man half her age while on holiday in Jamaica, much to the disapproval of both their families. Adapted from the best-selling novel by Terry McMillan, who loosely based the story on her own experience(n)

programme.title: Ghostbusters
programme.desc: Two paranormal researchers join forces with a nuclear engineer and a subway attendant to fight off a slew of ghosts that have invaded New York City. Eventually, they come face-to-face with an evil entity who can control human beings(n)

programme.title: Pineapple Express
programme.desc: Critically acclaimed director David Gordon Green takes a break from the brooding drama that defined such early efforts as George Washington and Undertow for this action-flavored buddy comedy concerning two pot-smoking friends (Seth Rogen and James Franco) who unwittingly become involved with a vicious gang of drug dealers. Judd Apatow and Shauna Robertson produce a script co-penned by star Rogen and Evan Goldberg(n)

programme.title: American Gods
programme.desc: Come to Jesus. As war approaches, Mr. Wednesday needs to recruit one more Old God: Ostara, aka Easter, Goddess of the Dawn, but swaying her requires making a good impression, so Mr. Nancy is brought in(n)

programme.title: Quarantine
programme.desc: Jay Hernandez, Jennifer Carpenter, and Johnathon Schaech star in this remake of Jaume Balagueró and Paco Plaza's successful, Spanish-language horror film [REC], which follows a television reporter and her cameraman as they fall under a mysterious quarantine issued on an inner-city apartment building. Television reporter Angela Vidal (Carpenter) and her trusty cameraman (Steve Harris) were documenting a night in the life of a Los Angeles fire station crew when the firefighters were summoned to a nearby apartment building to answer a routine 911 call. Upon arriving at the scene, Angela and company discover that police have already arrived to investigate the blood-curdling screams ringing out from one of the apartments. One of the women living in the building has been infected with something terrible, but what? When a few of the other residents are viciously attacked, they try to escape and discover that the CDC has quarantined the building. The officials in charge won't relay any information to those trapped inside the building, and it's impossible to seek information from the outside since telephone, Internet, television, and cell-phone access have all been cut off. By the time the quarantine is lifted, the intrepid cameraman's chilling footage provides the only evidence of the horrors that unfolded on that terrible night(n)

programme.title: A Dry White Season
programme.desc: Set in South Africa during the mid '70s when apartheid was still the norm, this provocative drama centers on a white schoolmaster's gradual awakening to the horrors of government-sanctioned racism(n)

programme.title: Dark Girls
programme.desc: A pair of filmmakers investigate how racial prejudice affects women of African descent(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang
programme.desc: Antonio Banderas stars as an LA private eye on the hunt for a missing girl and the diamonds she's disappeared with. Neo-noir thriller from the producer of Mulholland Drive(n)

programme.title: Broken Arrow
programme.desc: John Travolta goes bad as the pilot who steals two nukes, pursued by Christian Slater and perky park ranger Samantha Mathis. Ballistic action from John(n)

programme.title: American Gods
programme.desc: Come to Jesus. As war approaches, Mr. Wednesday needs to recruit one more Old God: Ostara, aka Easter, Goddess of the Dawn, but swaying her requires making a good impression, so Mr. Nancy is brought in(n)

programme.title: What Dreams May Come
programme.desc: Robin Williams stars in Vincent Ward's visually sumptuous story of a man whose love is so strong, it can conquer the after life. Williams and Annabella Sciorra are gloriously happy until their two children are killed in an accident. Somehow, they overcome the despair but when Williams is killed in an accident too, Sciorra can take no more pain and commits suicide. He awakes in a paradise but learns that her spirit is locked in perdition and can only be freed if he undertakes the perilous journey to find her and release her(n)

programme.title: Senseless
programme.desc: A college student overwhelmed with debt agrees to be a guinea pig for the science department, unaware that the chemical he ingests heightens his five senses to unheard-of proportions. Marlon Wayans, David Spade, Matthew Lillard, Brad Dourif, Tamara Taylor, Rip Torn, Richard McGonagle, Esther Scott, Ken Lerner, Kenya Moore, Ernie Lively(n)

programme.title: Idiocracy
programme.desc: Plucked from the ranks of the US Army because he is the most unremarkable, average individual they have, Corporal Joe Bauers participates in a top-secret human hibernation experiment that is intended to put him to sleep for a year. He is joined by prostitute Rita, who believes that she will escape from pending criminal charges if she takes part. After a series of mishaps, including the arrest and incarceration of the officer in charge of the project, the unlucky pair are abandoned and forgotten, only to wake up 500 years later in a world where the rampant breeding of stupid people has created a universally dumb society ruled by half-wits. Thus Joe and Rita find themselves in a brave new world where they are the two most towering intellects on the planet in Mike Judge's sci-fi comedy(n)

programme.title: Pineapple Express
programme.desc: Critically acclaimed director David Gordon Green takes a break from the brooding drama that defined such early efforts as George Washington and Undertow for this action-flavored buddy comedy concerning two pot-smoking friends (Seth Rogen and James Franco) who unwittingly become involved with a vicious gang of drug dealers. Judd Apatow and Shauna Robertson produce a script co-penned by star Rogen and Evan Goldberg(n)

programme.title: Broken Arrow
programme.desc: John Travolta goes bad as the pilot who steals two nukes, pursued by Christian Slater and perky park ranger Samantha Mathis. Ballistic action from John(n)

programme.title: Far From Heaven
programme.desc: Best Actress nominee Julianne Moore stars in writer-director Todd Haynes' sumptuous homage to the melodramas of the 1950s. Moore is superb as an affluent wife and mother whose picture-perfect world is shattered by a shocking discovery about her husband (Dennis Quaid) and a forbidden love affair. Dennis Haysbert, Patricia Clarkson, James Rebhorn, Viola Davis(n)

programme.title: Never Back Down
programme.desc: New in town Jake Tyler finds himself lured into a fight with local martial arts champion Ryan McCarty. After suffering a humiliating beating, Jake seeks the mentoring of a veteran fighter. (2008)(n)

programme.title: Cry, the Beloved Country
programme.desc: The story of a Zulu Christian Pastor's journey from a quiet Natal province to a modern, sinister Johannesburg in search of his son, his sister and his brother-all of whom have disappeared into an urban quagmire of crime, sin and political intrigue(n)

programme.title: Dan in Real Life
programme.desc: A widowed advice columnist who is struggling to raise three daughters falls in love with a French beauty---unaware she is his brother's girlfriend. Steve Carell ("The Office") and Juliette Binoche star in this charming romantic comedy. Dane Cook, Alison Pill, Brittany Robertson, Marlene Lawston. Directed by Peter Hedges(n)

programme.title: Madeline Sing Along: Madeline and Her Friends
programme.desc: The French schoolgirl from the beloved children's stories sings songs with her pals(n)

programme.title: Tuck Everlasting
programme.desc: A charming cast and beautiful sets bring Natalie Babbitt's kid-lit classic to life. Alexis Bledel stars as Winnie Foster, who encounters a family of immortals while wondering in the woods. William Hurt, Sissy Spacek, Jonathan Jackson, Ben Kingsley, Amy Irving, Victor Garber, Scott Bairstow(n)

programme.title: dirtgirlworld
programme.desc: Time Machine. Animated series about dirtgirl and her friends, who live in a world full of bizarre insects, underground tunnels, vaudevillian trained chickens and performing stunt bugs. After burying a time capsule the previous summer, dirtgirl and scrapboy decide it is time to dig it up, and ken is sent into the future(n)

programme.title: The Velveteen Rabbit
programme.desc: Live-action filmmaking mixes with imaginative animation in director Michael Landon Jr.'s feature adaptation of author Margery Williams' beloved children's book. An energetic child with a vivid imagination, Toby Morgan (Matthew Harbour) lives with his father (Kevin Jubinville), a successful businessman who seemed to shut down emotionally following the death of Toby's mother. When Toby is sent to spend the Christmas holidays with his loving but stern grandmother (Una Kay), he wanders through the lonely house until he eventually discovers the "magic attic" that was once his father's childhood playroom. There, Toby is surprised to find that his mother left him a stuffed velveteen rabbit -- her final gift to her beloved son. Hugging the rabbit close as he starts to cry, the grieving boy watches in wonder as his tears magically bring the toy to life. Before long, Toby is frolicking in the enchanted attic with a whole new group of friends, including the impetuous Horse (voiced by Tom Skerritt) and the wise but skittish Swan (voice of Ellen Burstyn). Toby's one wish is to spend Christmas with his father, and Rabbit's one wish is to someday hop across the fields as a real rabbit. Later, when Toby falls seriously ill, the courageous Rabbit helps him to win over his grandmother and make a full recovery. When Toby's father returns in time for Christmas, the power of the young child's love grants the Velveteen Rabbit its one true wish(n)

programme.title: The Santa Clause 3: The Escape Clause
programme.desc: It's not such a cool Yule when Jack Frost heads to the North Pole and gets entangled in a battle royale with Santa. This holiday tale also features appearances by the Sandman, the Tooth Fairy, Father Time, Cupid, Mother Nature and the Easter Bunny(n)

programme.title: Bolt
programme.desc: From Walt Disney Animation Studios comes Bolt, the tale of a superstar TV pup (voiced by John Travolta) who gets plopped in the middle of America with seemingly no way back to the glam and glitz of Hollywood. Thanks to his starring role on a hit television show, Bolt the pooch has become a household name. But Bolt has bought into his own heroic image, now believing that he really possesses the super-canine powers of his fictional television series. When he's accidentally shipped from Hollywood to New York City, he must rely on the help from his two newfound friends -- an abandoned house cat named Mittens (voiced by Susie Essman) and a television-addicted hamster named Rhino (voice of Mark Walton) -- as he embarks on a cross-country quest to get back to his owner (and co-star), Penny (voice of Miley Cyrus)(n)

programme.title: Inside Out
programme.desc: Emotions run wild in the mind of a young girl who is uprooted from her peaceful life and forced to move cities. Joy, Fear, Anger, Disgust and Sadness each have their own ideas about how she should handle her new surroundings(n)

programme.title: Big
programme.desc: Oft-imitated but never bettered, Big stars Tom Hanks at the peak of his '80s comedy powers. He captures the innocent energy of youth perfectly as a 12-year-old stuck in a 30-something body. Genius(n)

programme.title: National Treasure: Book of Secrets
programme.desc: In this adventure-filled sequel to the 2004 blockbuster 'National Treasure', Nicolas Cage reprises his role as artifact hunter and archaeologist Benjamin Franklin Gates. During a lecture about John Wilkes Booth (Abraham Lincoln¿s murderer) and Thomas Gates (Ben¿s great-grandfather), another treasure hunter by the name of Mitch Wilkinson stands up and presents a missing page of Booth¿s diary -- where Thomas is mentioned as a co-conspirator in Lincoln¿s assassination. Outraged, Ben decides to prove the honor of his ancestor, and together with his wife, Abigail, and his best friend, the writer Riley Poole, heads to France, England and Washington to collect clues(n)

programme.title: Tuck Everlasting
programme.desc: A charming cast and beautiful sets bring Natalie Babbitt's kid-lit classic to life. Alexis Bledel stars as Winnie Foster, who encounters a family of immortals while wondering in the woods. William Hurt, Sissy Spacek, Jonathan Jackson, Ben Kingsley, Amy Irving, Victor Garber, Scott Bairstow(n)

programme.title: Legends of Oz: Dorothy's Return
programme.desc: Dorothy and Toto return to Oz to battle the Jester, who has cast a dark spell over the land. Although the Jester tries to stop Dorothy from reaching her old friends in the Emerald City, some new allies appear to guide her along the Yellow Brick Road(n)

programme.title: Inside Out
programme.desc: Emotions run wild in the mind of a young girl who is uprooted from her peaceful life and forced to move cities. Joy, Fear, Anger, Disgust and Sadness each have their own ideas about how she should handle her new surroundings(n)

programme.title: Backstreet Boys: Show 'Em What You're Made Of
programme.desc: A look at the hugely popular boy band the Backstreet Boys. The filmmakers profile the group's five members as they discuss how fame changed them, and how they managed their careers after the hits dried up(n)

programme.title: Glitter
programme.desc: Glitter is the story of a young singer, Billie Frank, who overcomes a turbulent childhood and struggles to find her true family and her true voice. Abandoned as a child by her mother, Billie is remanded to an orphanage. Years later, Billie is discovered by Julian Dice, a charismatic, irresistible bad boy deejay who soon becomes her partner, producer and lover. With Dice, Billie begins an exciting but often volatile and precarious journey as she struggles through both her personal and professional life, riding the roller coaster to superstardom(n)

programme.title: Madeline Sing Along: Madeline and Her Friends
programme.desc: The French schoolgirl from the beloved children's stories sings songs with her pals(n)

programme.title: Kingdom Come
programme.desc: This familial comedy centers around the matriarch of an extended, dysfunctional family who reunite after the death of her husband, though it's apparent by everyone's reactions that the old man couldn't have died soon enough(n)

programme.title: dirtgirlworld
programme.desc: Rainbows. Animated series about dirtgirl and her friends, who live in a world full of bizarre insects, underground tunnels, vaudevillian trained chickens and performing stunt bugs. A search is on for the pot of gold at the end of the rainbow(n)

programme.title: Inside Out
programme.desc: Emotions run wild in the mind of a young girl who is uprooted from her peaceful life and forced to move cities. Joy, Fear, Anger, Disgust and Sadness each have their own ideas about how she should handle her new surroundings(n)

programme.title: One Direction: This Is Us
programme.desc: A thrilling look at the boy band One Direction includes behind-the-scenes footage of their world tour and a special performance at London's O2 Arena(n)

programme.title: High School Musical 3: Senior Year
programme.desc: Nobody does the "let's put on a show" song-and-dance extravaganza like this Disney franchise. In this splashy outing, the gang is faced with life decisions about their futures, especially those of Troy and Gabriella (Zac Efron, Vanessa Anne Hudgens), whose relationship could be impacted by the possibility that they might be attending different colleges in the fall. Ashley Tisdale, Lucas Grabeel, Corbin Bleu, Monique Coleman. Kenny Ortega directed(n)

programme.title: Glitter
programme.desc: Glitter is the story of a young singer, Billie Frank, who overcomes a turbulent childhood and struggles to find her true family and her true voice. Abandoned as a child by her mother, Billie is remanded to an orphanage. Years later, Billie is discovered by Julian Dice, a charismatic, irresistible bad boy deejay who soon becomes her partner, producer and lover. With Dice, Billie begins an exciting but often volatile and precarious journey as she struggles through both her personal and professional life, riding the roller coaster to superstardom(n)

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Nightmare as a Child. A precocious girl frightens a teacher (Janice Rule) by revealing secrets from the woman's past. Markie: Terry Burnham. Peter Selden: Shepperd Strudwick. Doctor: Michael Fox. Girl: Suzanne Cupito. Policeman: Joe Perry(n)

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: The Mind and the Matter. First telecast May 12, 1961, this amusing Twilight Zone entry was purely and simply a showcase for versatile comic actor Shelley Berman. The star is cast as Archibald Beechcroft, a dyed-in-the-wool misanthrope who despises everyone around him. With the help of an unusual "will power" book given to him by office boy Henry (Jack Grinnage), Beechcroft is able to make everyone else in the world disappear. Before long, however, the silence drives Beechcroft crazy, so he decides to populate the world with millions of Archibald Beechcrofts -- with similarly irksome results. "The Mind and the Matter" was written by series creator Rod Serling(n)

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: The Obsolete Man. The second season of Twilight Zone came to a powerful conclusion with this Rod Serling-scripted "message" drama. In a futuristic society where books and religion have been outlawed, librarian Romney Wordsworth stands on trial for his life. Adjudged "obsolete" by the imperious Chancellor (Fritz Weaver), Wordsworth is sentenced to death, whereupon he makes one last, unusual request: He wants to have his execution televised, and he wants the Chancellor to be in attendance. The episode's Kafkaesque ending might have packed even more of a punch had director Eliot Silverstein's original concept been carried out to the fullest. "The Obsolete Man" was originally telecast June 2, 1961(n)

programme.title: Big Fish
programme.desc: "In telling the story of my father, it's hard to separate fact from fiction. But that's the kind of story it is." So says William Bloom during the opening stages of Tim Burton's Big Fish. Bloom's father is Edward Bloom,an old codger who may be largely benign but is deemed a bullshitter by his son, and a selfish one at that. Edward's endless recounting of yarns about himself has distanced father and son. But when Edward is diagnosed with terminal cancer, William returns to the family home to try and make his peace, and find out who his father really is. Bed-bound, and with an audience of not just the cynical William but also his receptive wife Josephine, Edward recounts his remarkable life in fragments(n)

programme.title: Bridge to Terabithia
programme.desc: From the producers of The Lion, the Witch, and the Wardrobe and the mind of author Katherine Paterson comes a rousing fantasy adventure about family, friendship, and the wondrous power of imagination. A perpetual outsider both at home and at school, Jess Aarons (Josh Hutcherson) just never seems to fit in no matter how hard he tries. When his goal to become the fastest runner in middle school is unexpectedly thwarted by newly arrived classmate Leslie Burke (AnnaSophia Robb), who enters in an "all boys" race and leaves her competitors in the dust, Jess soon strikes up a friendship with the imaginative outsider. Their bond is soon cemented thanks to Leslie's love for storytelling and Jess' skill as an artist, and the two lonely kids create a secret kingdom called Terabithia that is only accessible by swinging over a stream on a nearby rope. Though Jess and Leslie may be considered outcasts by their classmates, their adventures in Terabithia find the pair doing battle against the dreaded Dark Master and his malevolent creatures while plotting revenge against the schoolyard bullies. Now, thanks to his adventures in Terabithia and his friendship with Leslie, Jess finally finds the confidence needed to stand tall and be himself(n)

All well and good -- until Gaines begins to suspect that the world on which he landed was not the world he had originally left behind. Written by Rod Serling, the 60-minute Twilight Zone episode "The Parallel" first aired March 14, 1963(n)

programme.sub-title: The One After Joey and Rachel Kiss
programme.desc: The One After Joey and Rachel Kiss. The tenth and final season of Friends opens with this 45-minute episode, which takes place right after the big kiss in Barbados. Rachel (Jennifer Aniston) and Joey (Matt LeBlanc) are definitely in love; the problem now is how to tell Ross (David Schwimmer). Of course, all the other friends know the whole story, thanks to those paper-thin hotel room walls. Elsewhere, Phoebe's (Lisa Kudrow) relationship with Mike (Paul Rudd) hits another snag in the form of his girlfriend "Precious" (Anne Dudek), and back in New York, Monica (Courteney Cox) goes to outrageous lengths to "tame" her unnaturally poofy hairdo(n)

The cupcake business also hits a snag when Max refuses to put her name to the product while promoting sales, leading Caroline to accuse her of having a fear of success. programme.desc: The One with Rachel's Going-Away Party. Not wishing to make a mass goodbye to her friends before leaving for Paris, Rachel (Jennifer Aniston) gives individual farewells to everybody -- except Ross (David Schwimmer). He is understandably put out until he learns the reason for Rachel's apparent snub. Meanwhile, Erica (Anna Faris), the mother of the Bings' soon-to-be-adopted child, goes into labor, making Monica's (Courteney Cox) plans to move to Westchester even more problematic(n)

programme.title: The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey
programme.desc: Bilbo Baggins (Martin Freeman) joins Gandalf (Ian McKellen) and a band of dwarves led by the brave Thorin (Richard Armitage) on a treacherous quest to reclaim their mountain home from the fierce dragon Smaug in this epic fantasy adventure adapted from J.R.R. Tolkien's beloved novel by the creative forces behind the Lord of the Rings trilogy. Long before Frodo Baggins (Elijah Wood) made his arduous journey to Mordor, his brave uncle Bilbo embarked on an adventure for the ages. Bilbo's story gets under way when the great wizard Gandalf appears at his front gate with a most unusual offer. Displaced from their massive fortress in the Lonely Mountain by Smaug - a greedy dragon who coveted their gold - a community of noble dwarves were decimated by a surprise attack by monstrous orcs, whose dreaded leader the Pale Orc slew their king in a gruesome battle. Now, Thorin, the descendent of the king, is determined to reclaim his mountain kingdom for his people. Together with a fearless team of dwarves, Thorin and Gandalf recruit Bilbo to aid them in their quest since Hobbits have the unique ability to go undetected when they wish to. Before Bilbo, Gandalf, and the dwarves can reach The Lonely Mountain and defeat Smaug, however, they'll have to contend with trolls, goblins, stone giants, Gollum (Andy Serkis), and even the dreaded Pale Orc himself. Peter Jackson directs a screenplay he co-penned with Fran Walsh, Philippa Boyens, and Guillermo del Toro(n)

programme.title: Guns of Wyoming
programme.desc: A rancher gets mixed up in an ongoing conflict between those like him, who wish to have their land fenced off, and cattlemen who want all the grasslands to be left open. He makes a powerful enemy in a wealthy cattle speculator, who enlists hired guns to cause mayhem on his land. Western, starring Robert Taylor, Joan Caulfield and Robert Loggia.(n)

programme.title: Star Trek: First Contact
programme.desc: Captain Jean-Luc Picard and the crew of the Enterprise face their deadliest enemies, the Borg, who travel back in time in an attempt to change Earth's history. The starship follows on a mission to foil their plan, but the vessel is taken over by members of the cyborg collective, leaving Picard consumed by a desire for revenge. Sci-fi adventure sequel, starring Patrick Stewart, Jonathan Frakes, Brent Spiner, James Cromwell and Alice Krige.(n)

programme.title: The Others
programme.desc: A woman awaits the return of her husband from the Second World War while struggling to care for her son and daughter. Both children suffer a violent reaction when exposed to daylight, forcing her to keep much of their isolated home on the island of Jersey shrouded in gloom. When the pair claim to see strangers in the house, their terrified mother begins to suspect that the souls of the dead are stalking the halls. Period supernatural thriller, starring Nicole Kidman, Fionnula Flanagan, Alakina Mann, James Bentley and Christopher Eccleston.(n)

programme.title: Escape from Alcatraz
programme.desc: A cunning convict with a history of making escape attempts is transferred to the notorious high-security island prison off the California coast, from which no one has ever broken out. Continually at odds with the brutal warden, he and three fellow prisoners hatch a plan to make it to freedom on an improvised raft. Thriller, based on a true story, starring Clint Eastwood, Patrick McGoohan, Roberts Blossom and Fred Ward.(n)

programme.title: Enter the Dragon
programme.desc: A powerful crime kingpin hosts a martial arts tournament on his island lair. A former Shaolin monk is recruited by an intelligence agency to enter the tournament and expose the crime lord's opium and slavery rings. He finds himself fighting for his life alongside two Vietnam veterans who are both fleeing their own enemies. Thriller, starring Bruce Lee, John Saxon, Jim Kelly and Kien Shih.(n)

programme.title: Conspiracy Theory with Jesse Ventura

programme.title: Katie
programme.desc: Documenting the life of 22-year-old Katie O'Halloran from Cill Chiarain, Connemara, who was born with femur-fibula-ulna syndrome, which left her without hands and with a short leg. Doctors told her family that she would never walk, and from a young age she used her leg to eat and write. With assistance, she attended both national and secondary schools, and went on to study law in NUI, Galway. In 2013, Katie discovered that new bebionic hands were available, and this programme follows her and the community as they attempt to raise funds for this life-changing opportunity.(n)

programme.title: Money Talks
programme.desc: Action and fast talking comedy abounds as motormouth Chris Tucker stars alongside Charlie Sheen as an escaped convict being chased by the police and a gang of diamond thieves. Franklin Hatchett is a small-time con man exposed by investigative reporter James Russell . When Hatchett becomes unwittingly involved in a jail break, the police think the escape was his idea. Not knowing where to hide, he calls the reporter and makes a deal: he will provide Russell with the exclusive story when he turns himself in, providing that Russell shelters him for the weekend. With a plan so simple, what could possibly go wrong?(n)

programme.title: Bad Boys II
